utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: How may I help you?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Hi, um my son has just been sick over the past uh couple of days. He's just had this cough and uh stuffy nose and uhm, yeah. He's also had this uh rash that just started.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and so can you tell me a bit more about the cough, so it started um?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, so the cough started about a week ago and um his stuffy nose, he's sort of had a stuffy nose since around the same time and then um, those symptoms um so it continued and got a little bit better over the past few days and then he started um having this rash on his face that then kind of went down to his neck.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and is the rash still uh there right now?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and is the cough uh productive, is he bringing up sputum?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um has he brought up um any blood?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and uh, you told me about the the runny nose, what um, can you describe the discharge?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah it's just uh it's just uh watery discharge. his eyes are also red and kind of um he's been teary. Or I guess just yeah, it's just been like very watery and red and uh yeah, it's clear discharge.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um has he had a sore throat?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, um how about any changes to his sense of smell or or taste?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm he, uh, he hasn't really, uh yeah, he hasn't said anything about that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright and has he had any problems with breathing.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Has he mentioned anything about chest pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, um has he had any fevers or chills?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, he does have a fever, um 39.5 I checked yesterday.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uh is that is that the first time that um he was noted to have a fever yesterday?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um he has had a fever for the past few days. Um it was around, it was less, between 37.5 to 38.5, um but then yesterday was just uh it just kept going up so I got concerned and thought I should bring him in.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, I see. Yeah well it's good that you brought him in. Um has he been having any night sweats?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And um how has his weight been over the last several months, has he been gaining weight OK still?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Oh yeah.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, that's great. Um and has he had any any any wheezing?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Um how about any like changes to his appetite?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um he's just been eating less since he's been feeling unwell.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, but he still he still he manages to eat about um half the plate. So I guess it's not too bad.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And that's been the last few days?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, yeah.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK and um has he had any muscle aches or body pains?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no, not really.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um is, are there any exposures that um could've possibly caused a skin rash like changes in like laundry detergent, or um like coming into contact with with anything on his skin or or taking um, or any anything that he was allergic to that he's been around?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um I don't think so. He was playing outside with the neighbours, um with the neighbour's kids, but I don't think he came into contact. I'm not sure.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uh, has he been diagnosed with any medical conditions before?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, he's pretty healthy.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK and sorry, just to to go back to the symptoms, I missed a few questions here. Did he have uh, does he have any nausea or vomiting?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: How about any diarrhea?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and any abdominal pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um nope.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Or or any urinary problems?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um And and so he hasn't been diagnosed with any medical conditions before. Um does he take any medications regularly, like prescribed or over the counter?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no he doesn't.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, and any allergies to medications or uh environment that you're aware of?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um are his immunizations up to date?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um well, no, I don't. I don't I don't vaccinate my kids. I'm just I'm I'm worried that they'll uh get autism.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, yeah, that's uh well, it's important to know um today that he's not vaccinated, because certainly that will influence um what we're thinking about in terms of what could be causing the symptoms. Um and we can uh discuss the, I guess more about the vaccination procedures and what not later. Um but OK, so he's not currently vaccinated, and have there been any um concerns with his growth and or development?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: He's meeting all of the the milestones and doing well at school?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and in terms of the pregnancy, uh were there any complications during the pregnancy like gestational diabetes or or um high blood pressure?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh I did have gestational diabetes.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Uh sorry yeah, did that require insulin or?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, I did have to take insulin. Um he was he was also a pretty big baby when he was born, um we had to, I had to give, get a C-section done.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, were there any complications with the with the procedure, with the surgery?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No no, no complications at all.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, did he have any um like breathing problems or jaundice or any reasons to stay in the hospital when when he was born?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, he didn't.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um that's good. And uh who's he living with and who's the primary caregiver currently?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: I'm the primary caregiver. Um he's got an older brother who's seven years old and his dad, it's the four of us. And we also have a dog.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Any allergies to the dog or to pets at all?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and um any reasons or concerns for um uh physical or emotional abuse in the home?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and um any family history of any heart or or lung problems?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: How about a family history of any bleeding disorders or or clotting disorders or cancers?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um so that was everything that I think I wanted to ask about on history. Um so it sounds like um he's had a cough, um a runny nose, um some red eye red eyes that, with some tearing as well as a rash that that started and and a fever. Was there any other symptoms?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright. Um so next we'll go on to the physical exam. We'll want to have a look um at the rash and get the vitals, um but there is a concern that this is, could be, uh Measles and so um it'll be important to um, supportive management and um ensure that um it's not passed on to um anybody else. That reminds me, yeah, he was out playing with other children, were any other kids experiencing similar symptoms?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um I'm not sure I I guess I need to talk to their their parents now.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Yeah it would be um a good idea to uh yeah contact um and see, just to make sure that we're treating everybody appropriately.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Sure.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: And then uh we could talk more about the vaccination um later.

utterances.speaker: control
utterances.text: Add differential diagnosis
